Title: 39528 - # Ways for Men to Get a Better Night's Rest
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 different tips that could help men get a better night's rest. You can discuss things like investing in a good mattress and pillows, trying to meditate for 15 minutes before getting into bed, making sure to not fall asleep with the TV on, and avoiding caffeine after 2pm. Be sure to include a wide range of things to try. Your target audience is men who are trying to get a good night of sleep. You can place your target URL in the section where you discuss investing in good pillows and how that can help you get better sleep.

Title: 39529 - Best Ways to Purchase Home Essentials on a Small Budget
Direction: 500 Words. List 3-6 different tips for shopping for home essentials on a budget. You can discuss options like shopping for wholesale items, buying used items from sites like Craigslist or garage sales, reading product reviews to make sure you're not wasting your money on low quality items, and using online shopping guides to help you make sure you're only getting what you need. Your target audience is women who are shopping on a budget. You can place your target URL in the section where you mention reading product reviews for items like bed sheets to make sure you're getting a great quality product.
